statements: UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great service, thank you!', customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET market_trend = 'Positive' WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET feedback_date = '2022-05-10', market_trend = 'Positive' WHERE customer_id = 101 AND feedback_id = 15;
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET market_trend = 'Neutral', feedback_text = 'Improved service delivery' WHERE customer_id = 120 AND feedback_date > '2022-03-15';
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great experience!', feedback_rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE MarketTrends SET trend_date = '2022-08-15', trend_description = 'Emerging Technology Trends' WHERE trend_category = 'Technology';
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great service!', feedback_rating = 5 WHERE customer_id = 123 AND feedback_id = 456;
